choices.answer: they are made in a factory
dead plants & amimals are exposed to pressure and heat
animal bones are dug up from the earth
cars burn gas and create fossil fuels

questions.question: Where can fossil fuels be found?

choices.answer: deep in the earth's core
deep in the earth's mantle
in the middle of the ocean
deep in the earth's crust

questions.question: Are fossil fuels a renewable resource?

choices.answer: No, they are consumed too quickly
No, they will never be remade on Earth
Yes, fossil fuels are made quickly
Yes, but it may take a few weeks

questions.question: How can fossil fuels be used as an energy source?

choices.answer: They are eaten to create energy.
They are buried to create energy.
They are burned to create energy.
They are not used to create energy.

questions.question: In what ways are fossil fuels a good source of energy?

choices.answer: They produce 86% of the world's energy.
They make our air cleaner.
They are a never ending supply.
They help our environment.

questions.question: What are the disadvantages of using fossil fuels as a source of energy?

choices.answer: Causes pollution
Not renewable
Hurts the environment
All of Above
